DOC.brief_title: Aloe Vera Chronic Periodontitis With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.detailed_description: BACKGROUND : Advances field alternative medicine promote widespread use herbal agent , like Aloe vera ( AV ) , medical dental therapy . AV anti-inflammatory , antioxidant , antimicrobial , hypoglycaemic , heal promote immune boosting property . The present study design investigate effectiveness AV gel local drug delivery adjunct scale root planing ( SRP ) treatment subject chronic periodontitis ( CP ) type 2 diabetes mellitus ( DM ) . MATERIAL AND METHODS : A total 60 subject probe depth ( PD ) ≥5mm clinical attachment level ( CAL ) ≥3mm randomly divide two group . Group 1 treat SRP + placebo gel local drug delivery ( LDD ) Group 2 SRP + AV gel LDD . Clinical parameter include full mouth plaque index ( PI ) , modiﬁed sulcus bleed index ( mSBI ) , probe depth ( PD ) clinical attachment level ( CAL ) record first baseline interval 3 month 6 month .
DOC.criteria: Wellcontrolled type 2 DM Chronic periodontitis moderate deep pocket [ probe depth ( PD ) ≥5mm clinical attachment loss ( CAL ) ≥3mm ] No history antibiotic periodontal therapy precede 6 month .
